title: LoL Custom Skins????
body:
Hiya :)

So I know that Riot have said you can no longer use custom skins, but I have seen Streamers/YouTubers (i.e. Prof Akali and Heizman) use them recently. Is there a special site or something where you won't get in trouble for using? Just asking because I'm interested in finding a Witch Evelynn skin, but I don't want to get banned.

Thanks :)
